titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the alternative fuel credit and the alternative fuel mixture credit.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the alternative fuel credit and the alternative fuel mixture credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the alternative fuel and alternative fuel mixture excise tax credits.
